titleStmt.title: The second set of madrigales to 3. 4. and 5. parts apt for viols and voices. Newly composed by Michaell Est.
titleStmt.author: East, Michael, ca. 1580-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet the assigne of VVilliam Barley,

notesStmt.note: Five partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus."; part 2: "Altus."; part 3: "Tenor."; part 4: "Bassus."; part 5: "Quintus.".
Signatures: A-C⁴ D² ; [A-C⁴ D² ; A-C⁴ D² ;] A-C⁴ D² ; A-C⁴ D² .
